tssurah: import { TYPE } from '../types/islam';export const surah_87: TYPE = {ayah_1: {image: '',text: 'Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,',verse: 5818,},ayah_2: {image: '',text: 'Who created and proportioned',verse: 5819,},ayah_3: {image: '',text: 'And Who destined and [then] guided',verse: 5820,},ayah_4: {image: '',text: 'And who brings out the pasture',verse: 5821,},ayah_5: {image: '',text: 'And [then] makes it black stubble.',verse: 5822,},ayah_6: {image: '',text: 'We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,',verse: 5823,},ayah_7: {image: '',text: 'Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.',verse: 5824,},ayah_8: {image: '',text: 'And We will ease you toward ease.',verse: 5825,},ayah_9: {image: '',text: 'So remind, if the reminder should benefit;',verse: 5826,},ayah_10: {image: '',text: 'He who fears [ Allah ] will be reminded.',verse: 5827,},ayah_11: {image: '',text: 'But the wretched one will avoid it -',verse: 5828,},ayah_12: {image: '',text: '[He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,',verse: 5829,},ayah_13: {image: '',text: 'Neither dying therein nor living.',verse: 5830,},ayah_14: {image: '',text: 'He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself',verse: 5831,},ayah_15: {image: '',text: 'And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.',verse: 5832,},ayah_16: {image: '',text: 'But you prefer the worldly life,',verse: 5833,},ayah_17: {image: '',text: 'While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.',verse: 5834,},ayah_18: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,',verse: 5835,},ayah_19: {image: '',text: 'The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.',verse: 5836,},name: surah_87,};
